text: Milomir Odović "Oda" (26 March 1955 – 15 December 2020) was a Bosnian professional football manager and player. He was known for playing and managing Bosnian Premier League club Željezničar. Odović died on 15 December 2020 in Sarajevo, Bosnia and Herzegovina, two years after being diagnosed with cancer at the age of 65. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Bosnia and Herzegovina footballers Category:Bosnia and Herzegovina football managers Category:Deaths from cancer
title: Milomir Odović
